com.nutiteq.styles

Class BalloonPopupStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.styles.Style
      • com.nutiteq.styles.BillboardStyle
        • com.nutiteq.styles.PopupStyle
          • com.nutiteq.styles.BalloonPopupStyle

  • public class BalloonPopupStyle
extends PopupStyle
    A style for balloon popups. Contains attributes for configuring how the balloon popup is drawn on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BalloonPopupStyle

        public BalloonPopupStyle(Color color,
                 float attachAnchorPointX,
                 float attachAnchorPointY,
                 boolean causesOverlap,
                 boolean hideIfOverlapped,
                 float horizontalOffset,
                 float verticalOffset,
                 int placementPriority,
                 boolean scaleWithDPI,
                 int cornerRadius,
                 Color leftColor,
                 Bitmap leftImage,
                 BalloonPopupMargins leftMargins,
                 Color rightColor,
                 Bitmap rightImage,
                 BalloonPopupMargins rightMargins,
                 Color titleColor,
                 java.lang.String titleFontName,
                 int titleFontSize,
                 BalloonPopupMargins titleMargins,
                 boolean titleWrap,
                 Color descColor,
                 java.lang.String descFontName,
                 int descFontSize,
                 BalloonPopupMargins descMargins,
                 boolean descWrap,
                 Color strokeColor,
                 int strokeWidth,
                 int triangleWidth,
                 int triangleHeight)
        Constructs a BalloonPopupStyle object from various parameters. Instantiating the object directly is not recommended, BalloonPopupStyleBuilder should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        color - The color for the popup.
        attachAnchorPointX - The horizontal attaching anchor point for the popup.
        attachAnchorPointY - The vertical attaching anchor point for the popup.
        causesOverlap - The causes overlap flag for the billboard.
        hideIfOverlapped - The hide if overlapped flag for the billboard.
        horizontalOffset - The horizontal offset for the popup.
        verticalOffset - The vertical offset for the popup.
        placementPriority - The placement priority for the popup.
        scaleWithDpi - The scale with DPI flag for the popup.
        cornerRadius - The corner radius of the popup in dp.
        leftColor - The background color of the left part of the popup.
        leftImage - The image of the left part of the popup.
        leftMargins - The margins of the left part of the popup.
        rightColor - The background color of the right part of the popup.
        rightImage - The margins of the right part of the popup.
        rightMargins - The margins of the right part of the popup.
        titleColor - The color of the title.
        titleFontName - The name of the title font.
        titleFontSize - The size of the title font.
        titleMargins - The margins of the title.
        titleWrap - True if long titles are wrapped, false if it is truncated.
        descColor - The color of the description.
        descFontName - The name of the description font.
        descFontSize - The size of the description font.
        descMargins - The margins of the description.
        descWrap - True if long descriptions are wrapped, false if it is truncated.
        strokeColor - The color of the stroke surrounding the popup.
        strokeWidth - The width of the stroke surrounding the popup in dp.
        triangleWidth - The width of the triangle at the bottom of the popup in dp.
        triangleHeight - The height of the triangle at the bottom of the popup in dp.
